articles.title: Apple iPhone 16 may upgrade to Wi-Fi 7 - Argus English
articles.description: The iPhone 16 will reportedly upgrade to Wi-Fi 7 to improve the ecosystem experience and make it easier for Apple to integrate hardware products running on the same local network.
